definition: doorway/gateway
the way to do sth/knack

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
while the connoisseur recognizes the artistry, the layman simply enjoys the show
pinyin: nei4 hang2 kan4 men2 dao5 , wai4 hang2 kan4 re4 nao5
containing_words.word: 內行看門道，外行看熱鬧

sentences.english: Dilettante watch the scene of bustle, adept guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 外行看熱鬧，內行看門道。

sentences.english: In the doorway stood a man with a gun.
sentences.chinese: 門道里站着一個拿槍的人。

sentences.english: The glass table is too wide, we can't carry in through the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃桌子太寬，我們無法把它擡過門道。

sentences.english: If you got the hookup, please get me a couple of Haitian kids.
sentences.chinese: 要是你們有門道的話，請幫我也帶幾個海地孩子吧。

sentences.english: At the back of the room there is a boarded up doorway.
sentences.chinese: 房間的後面有個用模板隔開的門道。

sentences.english: Many useful studies up on this.
Helen always has the means of study .
sentences.chinese: 張先生賺錢總是很有門道。

sentences.english: Babylon means the city that is the gateway of the god.
sentences.chinese: 巴比倫的意思就是上帝的門道。

sentences.english: He had to duck his head to get through the low doorway.
sentences.chinese: 他只得把頭低下才能通過那低矮的門道。

sentences.english: If I had begun earlier, I could have learned how.
sentences.chinese: 要是我早些做起，我就能學會門道了。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, dilettante watch the scene of bustle, expert looks at the way.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，外行看熱鬧，內行看門道。

sentences.english: Mr Zhang has always had the means of making money.
sentences.chinese: 在掙錢方面，張先生可有門道了。

sentences.english: You know Tom? He has the means of making money.
sentences.chinese: 你知道湯姆吧？他掙錢可有門道了。

sentences.english: It was often hung in doorways as a sign of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 人們常將它掛在門道以表示友誼。
適合大多數標準尺寸的門道32“至34”。

sentences.english: In Africa they can learn the ropes in a region where competition is weak.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以在非洲競爭較弱的地區摸索到門道。
